content: Tao Huang is a bachelor candidate in School of Computer Science and Technology, Huazhong University of Science and Technology. Now He works as the Research Intern at Sensetime. His research interests lie within deep learning for Computer Vision, particularly in Neural Architecture Search, Channel Pruning and Face Recognition.

title: Tao Huang
